line.comment: * SCRIPT NAME: plugin.zanzal.droneminer.trader
* DESCRIPTION: Trade in minerals
* AUTHOR: Zanzal DATE: 31 December 2013
* Disable self-defense - ship should not chase enemies if attacked.
* I would think turret scripts would still run though.
* The defensive wait script may still choose to fire missile volley's in race appropriate situations.
* [THIS]-> ignore ship command/signal [SIGNAL_ATTACKED]
* $rlenabled = [THIS]-> can be controlled by race logic
* do if $rlenabled
* [THIS]-> set race logic control enabled to [FALSE]
* Amount of ore until we don't bother to sell any more
* Maximum number of jumps to look for a place to sell from our current location
* Maximum number of stations to check when looking for places to sell
* Maximum range to use when calculating whether we want to do a multi-station sale
* Don't trade at these stations - Initially just player stations, and as the trade run progresses we automatically blacklist dangerous sectors.
* Even though we may only be told to mine X we will always attempt to sell all the ores we have.
* This only blacklists the sector for the duration of this trade cycle.
* [THIS]-> set ship command/signal [SIGNAL_ATTACKED] to global default behaviour
* do if $rlenabled
* [THIS]-> set race logic control enabled to [TRUE]
* Get all sectors buying minerals over volume - This list contains duplicate for random weighting purposes
* Pick a random sector
* Cleanup the list to include n stations from an arbitrary point around the first returned station
* $msg = sprintf: fmt='Avg Pos: %s', $position, null, null, null, null
* display subtitle text: text=$msg duration=20000 ms
* Always keep a few drones in reserve

line.text: 'Could not deploy freight drone. None in cargo hold.'
'Could not deploy freight drone. Docking bays full?'

sval.val: DMS: No place to sell
Could not deploy freight drone. None in cargo hold.
Could not deploy freight drone. Docking bays full?
SCRIPT NAME: plugin.zanzal.droneminer.trader
DESCRIPTION: Trade in minerals
AUTHOR: Zanzal DATE: 31 December 2013
Disable self-defense - ship should not chase enemies if attacked.
I would think turret scripts would still run though.
The defensive wait script may still choose to fire missile volley's in race appropriate situations.
[THIS]-> ignore ship command/signal [SIGNAL_ATTACKED]
$rlenabled = [THIS]-> can be controlled by race logic
do if $rlenabled
[THIS]-> set race logic control enabled to [FALSE]
Amount of ore until we don't bother to sell any more
Maximum number of jumps to look for a place to sell from our current location
Maximum number of stations to check when looking for places to sell
Maximum range to use when calculating whether we want to do a multi-station sale
Don't trade at these stations - Initially just player stations, and as the trade run progresses we automatically blacklist dangerous sectors.
Even though we may only be told to mine X we will always attempt to sell all the ores we have.
This only blacklists the sector for the duration of this trade cycle.
[THIS]-> set ship command/signal [SIGNAL_ATTACKED] to global default behaviour
do if $rlenabled
[THIS]-> set race logic control enabled to [TRUE]
Get all sectors buying minerals over volume - This list contains duplicate for random weighting purposes
Pick a random sector
Cleanup the list to include n stations from an arbitrary point around the first returned station
$msg = sprintf: fmt='Avg Pos: %s', $position, null, null, null, null
display subtitle text: text=$msg duration=20000 ms
Always keep a few drones in reserve
